creator: emmanuel.feller@free.fr
text:
In verbose mode : the name of the task doesn't appear when nested into a 
condition.

This is the script i use :
<condition property="a" value="true">
<and>
  <available type="file" file="foobar" />
  <uptodate>
    <srcfiles dir="${src}/>
    <mapper type="merge" to="${test.jar}"/>
  </uptodate>
</and>
</condition>

In this context, the uptodate element is not a task, it is a condition
and so its name should not appear as a task.
creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com
